    • Method Detail

      • isCursing

        public boolean isCursing()
        Checks if the player's prayer book is set to Ancient Curses.
        Returns:
        true if Curses are enabled; otherwise false.

      • isPrayerOn

        public boolean isPrayerOn(Prayer.Book prayer)
        Returns true if designated prayer is turned on.
        Parameters:
        prayer - The prayer to check.
        Returns:
        true if enabled; otherwise false.

      • isQuickPrayerOn

        public boolean isQuickPrayerOn()
        Returns true if the quick prayer interface has been used to activate prayers.
        Returns:
        true if quick prayer is on; otherwise false.

      • setPrayer

        public boolean setPrayer(Prayer.Book prayer,
                boolean activate)
        Activates/deactivates a prayer via interfaces.
        Parameters:
        prayer - The prayer to activate.
        activate - true to activate; false to deactivate.
        Returns:
        true if the interface was clicked; otherwise false.

      • setQuickPrayer

        public boolean setQuickPrayer(boolean activate)
        Activates/deactivates quick prayers via interfaces.
        Parameters:
        prayer - The prayer to activate.
        activate - true to activate; false to deactivate.
        Returns:
        true if the interface was clicked; otherwise false.

      • getSelectedPrayers

        public RSComponent[] getSelectedPrayers()
        Returns an array of RSComponents representing the prayers that are selected.
        Returns:
        An RSComponent array containing all the components that represent selected prayers.

      • getPrayerLeft

        public int getPrayerLeft()
        Gets the remaining prayer points.
        Returns:
        The number of prayer points left.

      • getPrayerPercentLeft

        public int getPrayerPercentLeft()
        Gets the percentage of prayer points left based on the players current prayer level.
        Returns:
        The percentage of prayer points left.
